body.name: Furinno Tidur Simple Design Dresser, 4-Tier Handle, Americano
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 49 mins
features: Manufactured from high quality particle board to ensure enhanced durability and increase life span.
Multiple color options for easy customization. Suitable for any room and easy blend in with existing home decor.
4-Tier storage compartments with ample space for easy storage and organization.
Top weight capacity of 20 pounds and 15 pounds for each shelf
body.description: Tidur Series consists of a variety of bedroom furniture with straightforward and minimalistic design. As simple as it seems, the Tidur Simple Design Drawer Dresser has a strong and sturdy structure while providing ample storage space. The dresser comes with multiple refreshing color options that fits most room settings. Customers can choose between a 3-drawer dresser or a 4-drawer dresser based on their needs. Featuring two-knob handle design along with the sliding rail, the drawers are easy to open and close for better accessibility. The assembly of the dresser is simple with the provided step-by-step illustrated assembly instructions and hardware all in a single box. Screwdriver and rubber mallet is neccessary to complete the assembly. A power tool will be required for the installation of wall mount. Care instructions: wipe clean with clean damped cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer. Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About the Manufacturer Bridging innovation with simplistic furniture, Furinno brings modern designs to transform your home into a one-of-a-kind oasis that will surely assist the compact and space saving need for your home. Engineered with recycled Malaysian rubberwood, Furinno is committed to making home furnishing easy affordable, and unique while remaining sustainable in the process. Furinno Tidur Bedroom Collection Tidur Series consists of a variety of bedroom furniture with straightforward and minimalistic designs. As simple as it seems, the Lucca Simple Design Drawer Dresser has a strong and sturdy structure while providing ample storage space. The dresser comes with multiple refreshing color options that fit most room settings. Modern color style. Stylish. Functional. Affordable. Easy to assemble.

Sizes and Choices This dresser comes with 3-drawer and 4-drawer dresser to satisfy different storage needs. Style for Days The attractive clean-lined design can meet all your storage needs, even in tight spaces while various finish options are versatile to blend well with an existing ensemble. Premium Quality Material Crafted from CARB (California Air Resources Board) grade composite wood tested for sturdiness and durability. Lightweight, strong and long-lasting product usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lower quality then IKEA…..
reviews.reviewText: Very cheap quality. If you want these for durability don’t buy them.. One had some paint chipped coming out of the box. I got two of them and both of them had this weird gap between the top and middle drawer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: My husband has been cussing this dresser out since he opened the box. Pieces are cheap and keep breaking and they didn't include any replacement parts. Guess live and learn and pay the extra money for something decent. We will keep it since I think my husband's head would explode if I asked him to break it down so I can return it. Its for sure cheap quality....instead of using it in our bedroom like I planned, we are going to shove it in my son's closet so we can at least get some use out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pictures online had it looking like a match to my other furniture. It was close, so that worked and the dresser was a good size for my needs.The bad part?Screws and bolts were missing, draw pulls were cheap plastic knobs, the piece for the back of the dresser was flimsy cardboard, the holes for the screws were not drilled correctly and it took 3 hours to build and was flimsy when I stood it up. Not sure what I can put on top but don't know that it can hold the weight of my television. The drawers were also very difficult to get on the track and align to fit into the dresser.I am using it for now but if I had to do it over again, I would look for something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dresser
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I needed. Great little dresser when you consider the price. Very basic. Fairly easy to put together for one person. Fits beautifully inside my small closet. Three nice spacious drawers that open and close well. There is nothing fancy about this dresser and you are getting materials that reflect the price. But I could not be happier with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose
reviews.reviewText: After putting the dresser together and moving it to its final resting place, the whole thing felt filmsy and felt like it wanted to come apart. Its not made from any good materials so its expected. Ill give it maybe one to one and a half years before it makes its way to keep us warm in the fire pit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good buy for price
reviews.reviewText: This was an overall good buy the the price. I am pleased to find one with multiple drawers to fit my smaller space. Time consuming to put together though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality dresser
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly a nice quality-looking dresser for a put-together-yourself. Drawers are deep too! Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m missing all the side drawers(8PCS) as well as all of the hardware pieces. I’m unable to put it together. I’ve reached out to Furinno for them to send the missing pieces. When I receive them I’ll update my review. Until then, so far it’s been such a headache. (Also box came in all squished but the parts that same in where in good condition. So much styrofoam inside the box!!)
